about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack to TerraTech. Composed by Dave Dexter & Holley Gray. Mixed and Produced by Tennyson Whyte & Jamie Finch.

1. GSO Theme
2. GSO Combat One
3. GSO Combat Two
4. GeoCorp Theme
5. GeoCorp Combat One
6. GeoCorp Combat Two
7. Venture Theme
8. Venture Combat
9. Hawkeye Theme
10. Hawkeye Combat One
11. Hawkeye Combat Two
12. Hawkeye Theme (Original)
13. Hawkeye (Original Combat One)
14. Hawkeye (Original Combat Two)
15. Grassland
16. Deserts
17. Mountains
18. Flats
19. Pillars
20. Ice
21. BONUS Halloween Theme
22. BONUS Halloween Explore
23. BONUS Christmas Theme
24. Better Future Theme

Soundtrack comes in .wav and .mp3 formats.
